name: Event Management
description: Built an Event Management Web application to manage Events in Sapient. Using technologies HTML, CSS,JavaScript, JQuery, Ajax as front End and Servlets and JDBC as backend. Database used was MySql.

name: Bookstore
description: Built an e-commerce web application using Spring and Hibernate Framework as backend technologies and JSP, HTML and JSTL as the front end technologies. Database used was MySql.

name: B2B Shopping Site
description: Built restful Web services and Components for the B2B website using JAVA,Spring and Hibernate Framework as backend technologies.

name: Advisory Website
description: Built web application using Spring Boot, Spring Security and Hibernate framework and RabbitMQ as backend technology. HTML, css, Jquery, javascript used as front end technology. MySql used as database server.
